actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to clarify that other relevant private sector entities may participate in the FinCEN Exchange.
short_title: Financial Crimes Enforcement Network Exchange Improvement Act

summary.text:
Financial Crimes Enforcement Network Exchange Improvement Act 

This bill allows relevant private sector entities to participate in the Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN) Exchange, a voluntary information-sharing partnership between law enforcement agencies, national security agencies, financial institutions, and FinCEN to prevent money laundering, terrorism financing, organized crime, and other financial crimes.

titles.title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to clarify that other relevant private sector entities may participate in the FinCEN Exchange.
Financial Crimes Enforcement Network Exchange Improvement Act
